summary: LIC insurance plan comparison application with trilingual support (Marathi, Hindi, English) featuring 6 plans (Jivan Labh 736, Jivan Umang, Bima Laxmi 881, Jivan Lakshya, Jivan Utsav, Jivan Shanti 850) with side-by-side comparison, premium/maturity calculators, ROI analysis, and search/filter functionality
architectural_notes: 6 LIC insurance plans: Jivan Labh 736, Jivan Umang, Bima Laxmi 881, Jivan Lakshya, Jivan Utsav, Jivan Shanti 850
Trilingual support required: Marathi, Hindi, and English with language switcher
Data extraction from uploaded insurance plan images including premium tables, maturity benefits, policy terms
Calculator components for premium computation and maturity benefit projections
Comparison engine for side-by-side plan analysis and ROI calculations
Filter/search system by user criteria: age, budget, financial goals

existing_features.title: Create a side-by-side plan comparison view that allows users to select multiple LIC plans (Jivan Labh 736, Jivan Umang, Bima Laxmi 881, Jivan Lakshya, Jivan Utsav, Jivan Shanti 850) and display their key features, premiums, maturity benefits, and policy terms in a tabular format for easy comparison

Build an interactive premium calculator that allows users to input their age, desired sum assured, and policy term, then calculates the required monthly/annual premium for each LIC plan based on the premium tables from the uploaded images

Create a maturity benefit calculator that takes user inputs (premium amount, policy term, age) and calculates the total maturity amount including bonuses and guaranteed additions for each plan, using the data from the uploaded plan images

Implement a Return on Investment (ROI) analysis feature that calculates and displays the effective annual return percentage for each plan based on total premiums paid versus maturity benefits received, with visual comparison charts

Add search and filter functionality that allows users to filter LIC plans by criteria including age range (minimum/maximum entry age), budget range (monthly/annual premium limits), and financial goals (savings, pension, money-back, guaranteed returns), with real-time filtering of the plan grid

new_feature_requests.summary: Extract and structure data from 6 LIC plan images
Add search and filter by age/budget/goals
Create mobile-responsive UI with LIC branding

Extract and structure detailed data from all 6 uploaded LIC plan images including premium tables with age-based rates, maturity benefit formulas, policy terms, guaranteed additions/bonuses, risk coverage details, and special features, then integrate this data into the backend LICPlan records to support accurate calculator and comparison functionality
